DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test hypothesis acupuncture reduce Fibromyalgia pain , via alteration process pain central nervous system .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients healthy control enrol study total 6 week . This include screen baseline visit , 8 acupuncture treatment ( 2 per week 4 week ) , follow-up visit treatment 1 week completion study treatment session . To determine effect acupuncture pain , patient healthy control undergo psychophysical pain test four point throughout study : Baseline ( appointment 1 ) , post-treatment 1 ( appointment2 ) , post treatment 8 ( appointment 9 ) , final follow-up session ( 1 week last treatment - appointment 10 ) .Participants also fill brief report pain , sleep , function palm pilot . This expected take less 2 minute per day occur throughout 6 week study period .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1850 2 . Fibromyalgia patient OR healthy control 3 . No current opioid use 4 . Patients : must Fibromyalgia 6 month longer 1 . Inflammatory disorder ( lupus , rheumatoid arthritis ) 2 . Current untreated depression 3 . Active infection 4 . Healthy control : pain disorder major medical condition discretion investigator interfere validity study 5 . Heart disease use cardiac pacemaker
